review_needed: The sub-song titles (e.g., 'Amor de Chocolate') are not explicitly captured in the JSON structure as there's no dedicated key for them.
Implicit section name 'Bailão (Alto Sax)' used for plain text content under sub-song title 'Bailão (Alto Sax)'.
Implicit section name 'Bailão (Trombone)' used for table content under sub-song title 'Bailão (Trombone)'.
Section 'Bailão (Trombone)' had mixed content (table then plain text). The plain text part was treated as a new section named 'Bailão (Trombone) - Part 2'.
Implicit section name 'Bailão (Trompete/Tenor)' used for table content under sub-song title 'Bailão (Trompete/Tenor)'.
Section 'Bailão (Trompete/Tenor)' had mixed content (table then plain text). The plain text part was treated as a new section named 'Bailão (Trompete/Tenor) - Part 2'.
